# currencyCode

**Instance Property**

The ISO 4217 currency code that applies to the price information.

## Declaration

```swift
var currencyCode: String! { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this value to determine the appropriate currency designator to apply to the value in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRideFareLineItem/price] property. To retrieve the list of available currency codes, call the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSLocale/isoCurrencyCodes] method of the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSLocale] class.

## Getting the Line Item Information

- **title**: The localized string containing a description of the charge.
- **price**: The cost value of the line item.

items.description: The localized string containing a description of the charge.
items.name: title

items.description: The cost value of the line item.
items.name: price

title: currencyCode
